org.dotplot.image
Class Util

java.lang.Object
  org.dotplot.image.Util
public final class Util
extends java.lang.Object

Container class for several "tools" used in the plugin.

exportDotplotInROIByInfoMural

public static void exportDotplotInROIByInfoMural(ITypeTableNavigator navigator,
                                                 java.awt.Dimension targetSize,
                                                 java.awt.Rectangle roi,
                                                 java.lang.String filename)
Exports the part of the navigator, defined by the roi, to the given file by using the Information Mural for the scaling to the given size.

Parameters:
navigator - the data to be exported
targetSize - the target size
roi - the ROI
filename - the target

getDetailsForLoc

public static IROIResult getDetailsForLoc(java.awt.Point location,
                                          java.awt.Dimension imageSize,
                                          float scale,
                                          ITypeTableNavigator nav)
returns some meta information for the given location.

Parameters:
location - the location
imageSize - the size of the corresponding image
scale - the scale factor of the original data to the currently displayed image
nav - the source data
Returns:
details for the location
